title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: September 08, 2023, 02:50:20 PMLast edit: September 18, 2023, 01:30:43 AM by julerz12
content: [EDIT]9/11/23 The Bet2Dream team has confirmed, all participants can use BSC (Binance smart chain) wallet to receive their USDT bounty rewards. To update your wallet on the main spreadsheet, simply register again but make sure to update your PoA.If you want to participate in the Referral campaign, the use of the Whisper MSG wallet is still required when you sign up on B2D website.[EDIT]9/18/23 The Bet2Dream team has decided to temporarily pause this bounty campaign as they have some technical changes & maintenance to do for the project.Your stakes for WEEK 1 will be tallied and all registration and submission forms will be temporarily closed. We will resume this bounty campaign on WEEK 2 once everything is set and ready again.You may remove your signatures/avatars for now. Feel free to join again once we resume.Bet2Dream Twitter Campaign AvatarDownloadBet2Dream Signature Campaign AvatarDownloadBet2Dream Signature Campaign Personal TextCode:Bet2dream.comBet2Dream Signature Campaign SignaturesHero/Legendary Rank SignaturesQuote.Bet2Dream.|....
